style_property.title: Web app background color
style_property.description: This color is used on the splash screen when the web application is first launched.

style_property.title: Web app icon (192x192)
style_property.description: Icon should be in png format. Icons are used in places like the home screen, app launcher, task switcher, splash screen, etc.

style_property.title: Web app icon (512x512)
style_property.description: Icon should be in png format. Icons are used in places like the home screen, app launcher, task switcher, splash screen, etc.
